title: FeedForAll Sample Feed
description: RSS is a fascinating technology. The uses for RSS are expanding daily. Take a closer look at how various industries are using the benefits of RSS in their businesses.

items.title: RSS Solutions for Restaurants
items.content_html:
FeedForAll helps Restaurant's communicate with customers. Let your customers know the latest specials or events.

RSS feed uses include:
Daily Specials
Entertainment
Calendar of Events

items.title: RSS Solutions for Schools and Colleges
items.content_html:
FeedForAll helps Educational Institutions communicate with students about school wide activities, events, and schedules.

RSS feed uses include:
Homework Assignments
School Cancellations
Calendar of Events
Sports Scores
Clubs/Organization Meetings
Lunches Menus
